$WmMPID_ハロゼロ,ch05_11_Zero_M_Halloween18,Face|This festival is absolutely diabolical...
There's so much mischief to be had.
And all of that begging for treats...$k$pI feel that it caters to the base desires
of man. Wouldn't you agree?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロドルカス,ch03_17_Dorcas_M_Halloween18,Face|Sorry, but...you lost me. Way back.$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ハロゼロ,ch05_11_Zero_M_Halloween18,Face|We're going to have to pick this up
again later. I'm eager to tease some
more out of you...$k$pI must see if you have...stamina.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロドルカス,ch03_17_Dorcas_M_Halloween18,Face|You lost me. Again.$k$p$Sbs150|
